common.name: Kimchi
common.description: A traditional Korean side dish made from fermented vegetables, usually cabbage, and a variety of seasonings including chili pepper, garlic, scallions, and ginger.

common.name: Bibimbap
common.description: A popular Korean dish made with steamed white rice and a variety of vegetables, meat, and gochujang (red chili pepper paste).

common.name: Bulgogi
common.description: A popular Korean dish made with marinated beef, usually cooked over an open flame or on a grill.

common.name: Japchae
common.description: A popular Korean dish made with sweet potato noodles, vegetables, and a variety of seasonings.

unique.name: Haemul Pajeon
unique.description: A traditional Korean dish made with a variety of seafood, vegetables, and a savory batter.

unique.name: Makchang Gui
unique.description: A traditional Korean dish made with marinated pork belly, grilled over an open flame or on a grill.

unique.name: Jokbal
unique.description: A traditional Korean dish made with braised pig's feet, usually served with a spicy sauce.

unique.name: Gyeran Mari
unique.description: A traditional Korean dish made with eggs, vegetables, and a variety of seasonings, rolled into a log and sliced into individual servings.
